name: Pokémon: The Darkest Timeline
overview: Name: Pokemon TDT (The Darkest Timeline) Type: GBA Hack of: Fire Red Language: English Creator: PunsAreFun ________________________________________ Story You and your brother are Team Rocket grunts in search to make a name for yourself. But who knows what’s in store when you both find... dragons! Is Team Rocket right for you? Will this be the year they, with you, finally take over the world? ________________________________________ Features •
